headline: Online Tip
subtitle: Let Me Take a Selfie…
content: Immortalize those amazing GTA moments for all to enjoy by taking a quick snap on your Phone’s camera - you can also turn the camera to face you so you can take a selfie!~n~~n~There are lots of borders and filters to add an extra touch of style to your pictures.~n~~n~There is even a Meme Maker for adding a caption to your images, ready for the Social Club masses. Browse any photo in your gallery and hit ~INPUT_FRONTEND_X~ to enter the Meme Maker.
